org.svvrl.goal.gui.pref
Class Preference

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.Preference
      org.svvrl.goal.gui.pref.Preference

public class Preference
extends Preference

This class contains several options for the GUI package.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
